AttachExtendedSealedFileEvidenceText: The document is sealed with a keyless digital signature$if(full)$ by $_theScriveSystem()$$endif$.
AttachGuardtimeSealedFileEvidenceText: The document is sealed with a digital signature$if(full)$ by $_theScriveSystem()$$endif$.
AttachSealedFileEvidenceText: $_TheScriveSystem()$ prepares the Evidence Package before sealing with a digital signature.$if(full)$ The Evidence Package consists of the Verification Page, Evidence Log, Evidence of Intent, Evidence Documentation and Digital Signature Documentation (all as defined in the Evidence Documentation).$endif$
CancelDocumenElegEvidenceText: $_TheScriveSystem()$ rejects the $signatory$’s attempt to sign the document. The reason for the rejection was that the $signatory$’s identity information did not match the identity information received from the e-ID provider.$if(full)$ Information given by the e-ID provider: $msg$.$endif$
CancelDocumentEvidenceText: The invitation to sign is withdrawn$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$.$_ThePossibilityToSignIsDisabled()$
CloseDocumentEvidenceText: $_TheScriveSystem()$ locks the document from further modifications by the signing parties.
InvitationEvidenceText:
$_TheScriveSystem()$ sends an invitation$_to_review_or_sign()$ to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$.$if(full)$ The invitation includes a link that when clicked leads to the Online Sign View.$endif$$if(text)$ The invitation$_to_review_or_sign()$ contains the following message:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
InvitationUndeliveredByEmailText: $_TheEmailSystemReportsThatTheInvitation()$ $if(!archive)$ to $signatory$$endif$ could not be delivered by email and continued attempts are cancelled.
InvitationUndeliveredBySMSText: $_TheSMSSystemReportsThatTheInvitation()$ $if(!archive)$ to $signatory$$endif$ could not be delivered by SMS and continued attempts are cancelled.
PreparationToPendingEvidenceText: $if(full)$The preparation of the signing process settings is finished$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$, and $_theScriveSystem()$ locks the document from editing. The signing process language is set to $lang$, and the signing due date is set to $timeouttime$ UTC.$if(timezone)$ The time zone $timezone$ is provided by $actor$.$endif$$endif$
ProlongDocumentEvidenceText: The due date for signing is prolonged$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$.
RejectDocumentEvidenceText:
The invitation to sign is rejected$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$.$_ThePossibilityToSignIsDisabled()$$if(text)$ The rejection message$if(!archive)$ from $actor$$endif$ is:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
ReminderSendText:
$if(full)$It is requested $if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$ that a reminder to sign should be sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$, and $_theScriveSystem()$$else$$_TheScriveSystem()$$endif$ sends a reminder$_to_review_or_sign()$ $signatory$.$if(text)$ The reminder message$if(!archive)$ from $actor$$endif$ is:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
ResealedPDFText: $if(full)$Preparation of the Evidence Package is requested by $if(!archive)$$actor$, $endif$a person authorised to administer $_theScriveSystem()$.$endif$
RestartDocumentEvidenceText: $if(full)$The signing process settings are opened in the Design View for editing $if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$$endif$.
SignDocumentEvidenceText:
The document is signed$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$$_using_identification_method()$.$if(eleg)$$if(full)$

The text signed in the e-ID client was: 

$infotext$

E-legitimation provider: $provider$.

$if(fieldsverified)$

Information about signatory verified by $provider$: $if(fstnameverified)$ First name; $endif$ $if(lstnameverified)$ Last name; $endif$ $if(persnumverified)$ Personal number; $endif$

$endif$

Signature:

$signature$

$if(certificate)$

Certificate:

$certificate$

$endif$ $if(ocsp)$

Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) Response:

$ocsp$

$endif$$endif$$endif$
SignatoryLinkVisitedText: $if(full)$The link in the invitation$_to_review_or_sign()$ is clicked$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$. $endif$The document is opened $if(!archive)$by $actor$$endif$ $if(full)$in the Online Sign View$else$online$endif$.
TimeoutDocumentEvidenceText: The due date for signing the document passes.$_ThePossibilityToSignIsDisabled()$
_TheEmailSystemReportsThatTheInvitation: $if(full)$$_TheScriveSystem()$’s external email delivery system reports that the invitation$else$The invitation$endif$
_ThePossibilityToSignIsDisabled: $if(full)$ The possibility to sign is disabled by $_theScriveSystem()$.$endif$
_TheSMSSystemReportsThatTheInvitation: $if(full)$$_TheScriveSystem()$’s external SMS delivery system reports that the invitation$else$The invitation$endif$
